ImportClusterButton.Title: Import a new cluster
ImportClusterButton.Body: Bring a new cluster to the ecosystem and instantly eliminate all administration overhead in less than 15 minutes.

ImportClustterForm.Description: Description must have at least 1 character
ImportClustterForm.Host: Host must have at least 1 character
ImportClustterForm.Name: Name must have at least 1 character
ImportClustterForm.Password: Password must have at least 8 characters
ImportClustterForm.Port: Port must be a positive integer
ImportClustterForm.User: User must have at least 1 character

UsersPage.TopDescription: Configure e manage all aspects related to access of your cluster

QueuesPage.TopDescription: Configure e manage all aspects related to queues of your cluster

ExchangePage.TopDescription: Configure e manage all aspects related to exchanges of your cluster
